articles.title: Hiring mandates by tech companies record a steep drop - Economic Times
articles.description: The top Indian IT majors Tata Consultancy Services, Infosys, Wipro and HCL Tech had hired around 2.2 lakh employees during fiscal 2022 amid concentrated demand for digitisation triggered by the pandemic.
articles.content:
